general: Today, dear Leo, you will be in a joyful and loving atmosphere thanks to a beautiful union between Mercury and Venus. Show kindness to everyone you meet, and your actions will be warmly reflected. Clarity and harmony bring you great serenity, and you will have a gift for helping your loved ones find their own peace. Try to see the good in humanity as the Moon in Gemini and Chiron align, while spreading messages of acceptance and compassion. However, beware of jealousy that may arise among those who are not satisfied as Saturn stirs this afternoon. Do not let your peers diminish your successes. Return home early and savor some quiet time once Luna enters Cancer.
love: Express your feelings sincerely, it will strengthen your bonds.
work: Stay focused on your goals, do not let jealousy distract you.
health: Take time to relax and recharge.
advice: Cultivate inner peace and share it around you.
teaser: Love and radiate today, dear Leo!
